Key Match Events: The Cleveland Guardians defeated the Detroit Tigers 5-1 in Game 1 of the ALDS
Post-Match Reflections: Jose Ramirez expressed his excitement about the team's victory and their chances in the series
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played in cold and rainy conditions
Others: The Guardians' starting pitcher, Triston McKenzie, pitched a strong game, allowing only one run
